plot: Two homeless girls find an lost old man in the streets of Salvador, and are willing to help him. But they start using him to get alms from people.
title: Esses Moços
plot_es: Two homeless girls find an lost old man in the streets of Salvador, and are willing to help him. But they start using him to get alms from people.
plot_en: Two homeless girls find an lost old man in the streets of Salvador, and are willing to help him. But they start using him to get alms from people.
